$:/plugins/TWaddle/SideEditor/Button.text:
\whitespace trim

\define buttoncontent()
<$action-setfield
   $tiddler="$:/state/SideEditor"
   text={{!!title}}
   display="block" />
<$action-deletetiddler
   $tiddler="$:/temp/SideEditor/macrotext"/>
<$action-deletetiddler
   $tiddler=<<unusedtitle>>/>
<$list filter="[all[current]!has[title]]">
   <$action-setfield
      $tiddler="$:/state/SideEditor"
      newtid=yes />
</$list>
<$list filter="[all[current]has[title]]">
   <$action-sendmessage
      $message="tm-close-tiddler"
      $param=<<unusedtitle>>/>
   <$action-deletefield
      $tiddler="$:/state/SideEditor" newtid />
</$list>
\end

<$list filter="[all[current]!tag[$:/tags/Macro]]">
   <$button  class=<<tv-config-toolbar-class>> >
      {{$:/core/images/right-arrow}}
      <<buttoncontent>>
   </$button>
</$list>
<$list filter="[all[current]tag[$:/tags/Macro]]">
   <$button class=<<tv-config-toolbar-class>>
        actions="""<$action-setfield $tiddler='$:/temp/SideEditor/macrotext' text={{!!text}} />""" >
      {{$:/core/images/right-arrow}}
      <<buttoncontent>>
   </$button>
</$list>

$:/plugins/TWaddle/SideEditor/Window.title: $:/plugins/TWaddle/SideEditor/Window
$:/plugins/TWaddle/SideEditor/Window.creator: twMat

$:/plugins/TWaddle/SideEditor/Stylesheet.text:
#sideeditor { 
  display:none;
  display:{{$:/state/SideEditor!!display}};
}
#se-main {
  position:fixed;
  z-index:2001;
  top:{{$:/plugins/TWaddle/SideEditor/Metrics!!top}}vh; 
  left:{{$:/plugins/TWaddle/SideEditor/Metrics!!left}}vw;
  right:0px;
  height:0;
}

/********** TOOLBAR *********/
.se-toolbar {
  background:<>;
  border:1px solid silver; 
  height:2.3em;
}
.se-toolbar-title {
  display:inline-block;
  white-space:nowrap;
  width:auto !important;
}
.se-toolbar-btns {
  position:absolute;
  background:<>; 
  margin:1px;
}
.se-toolbar-btns.se-right {
  right:0;
  padding-right:2em;
  margin-right:2px;
}
.se-toolbar-btns.se-left { 
}
.se-toolbar-btns.se-right:before { /* Fade title if covered */
  position:absolute; margin-top:1px;
  content:" ";
  min-width:1em; margin-left:-1em;
  height:90%;
  background:linear-gradient(90deg, transparent 0%, <> 100%);
}
.se-toolbar-btns button {
  width:3em; height:2em;
  fill:<>;
  background:transparent;
  border:0;
  margin:0px 0 0 -4px;
}
.se-toolbar-btns button:hover svg {
  fill: <>;
}
.se-toolbar-btns button:active,
 .se-toolbar-btns button:focus { outline:0;
}

/********** EDITOR AREA **********/

/* In a table cos textarea don't allow pseudo elements for hover margin. */
.se-editor-table,
 .se-editor-table tr,
 .se-editor-table td {padding:0; margin:0; border:0;
}
.se-editor-table {
  margin-left:-1.5em;
x min-width:calc(100% + 1.5em); 
  background:transparent;
}
.se-editor-table:after {
  position:absolute;
  content:"";
  width:100%;
  height:1em;
}
.se-editor,
 .se-editor-placeholder {
  min-height:100px;
  padding:5px; padding-bottom:1em;
  max-height:calc(100vh - {{$:/plugins/TWaddle/SideEditor/Metrics!!top}}vh - 2.3em);
  width:calc(100vw - {{$:/plugins/TWaddle/SideEditor/Metrics!!left}}vw - 1.2em);
  vertical-align:top;
}
.se-editor {
  resize:none;  /* remove to get resize */
  margin-bottom:-5px;
  border:1px solid darkgrey;
  border-top:0; 
}
.se-editor-placeholder {
  color:silver;
  background:<>;
}

/********** RESIZING SLIDERS ************/

.se-slider-top { /* Covers/hides eventual sidebar scrollbar */
  position:fixed;
  transform:rotate(90deg);
  width:100vh !important;
  height:22px; /* width to cover sidebar scrollbar */
  right:calc(-50vh + 10px);
  bottom:50vh;
  background: <> !important;
  border:none;
}
.se-slider-left {
  position:fixed;
  left:.5em;
  z-index:2003;
  bottom:2vmin;
  width:100%; /* MS can't handle vmax here */
  border:none;
}

/*** CRED: https://css-tricks.com/styling-cross-browser-compatible-range-inputs-css/ ***/

/** Applying base styles *******************/

.se-sliders input[type=range] { /* for FF */
  -webkit-appearance: none; width: 100%; background:transparent; }
.se-sliders input[type=range]::-webkit-slider-thumb { -webkit-appearance: none; }
.se-sliders input[type=range]:focus { outline: none; }

/** Styling the Thumb ***********************/

/* Special styling for WebKit/Blink */
.se-sliders input[type=range]::-webkit-slider-thumb {
  -webkit-appearance: none;
  box-shadow: inset 4px 0px 0px silver, 0px 0px 0px #000000;
  border: 0px;  border-radius: 0px;
  height: 20px; width: 6px;
  background: transparent;
  cursor: pointer;
}
.se-sliders input[type=range]::-webkit-slider-thumb:hover {
  border:3px solid silver;
}

/* All the same stuff for Firefox */
.se-sliders input[type=range]::-moz-range-thumb {
  box-shadow: inset 4px 0px 0px silver, 0px 0px 0px #000000;
  border: 0;  border-radius: 0px;
  height: 20px; width: 6px;
  background: transparent;
  cursor: pointer;
}
.se-sliders input[type=range]::-moz-range-thumb:hover {
  border:3px solid silver;
}

/* All the same stuff for IE */
.se-sliders input[type=range]::-ms-thumb {
  box-shadow: inset 4px 0px 0px silver, 0px 0px 0px #000000;
  border: 0px solid blue;  border-radius: 0px;
  /* height: 20px; width: 16px; */ 
  background: transparent;
  cursor: pointer;
}
.se-sliders input[type=range]::-ms-thumb:hover {
  border:3px solid silver;
}
/** Styling the Track *************************/

.se-sliders input[type=range]::-webkit-slider-runnable-track {
  width: 100%; height: 1px; margin-top:-10px;
}
.se-sliders input[type=range]::-moz-range-track { height: 0px; 
}
.se-sliders input[type=range]::-ms-track{ height: 1px; margin-top:-10px;
}
$:/plugins/TWaddle/SideEditor/Stylesheet.title: $:/plugins/TWaddle/SideEditor/Stylesheet
$:/plugins/TWaddle/SideEditor/Stylesheet.creator: Mat von TWaddle

$:/plugins/TWaddle/SideEditor/readme.creator: Mat von TWaddle
$:/plugins/TWaddle/SideEditor/readme.text:
''SideEditor'' floats a tiddlers editor by the story river side, giving you a //live// view of the effects from your editing. ''Usage'' *''Activate'' SideEditor via the tiddler tool {{$:/core/images/right-arrow}} or page tool {{$:/plugins/TWaddle/SideEditor/new-icon}} *''Re-size'' it via the "handle bars" at upper-right and lower-left corner *''Switch focus'' between //Sidebar, River// and //SideEditor// by ''hovering'' ''Separate window use''   {{$:/core/images/open-window}} *''Stick window'', using separate software ([[e.g|https://www.google.com/search?q=deskpins&oq=deskpins&aqs=chrome.0.69i59j0l7.5485j0j7&sourceid=chrome&ie=UTF-8]]), to simplify copy-pasting *''Go distraction free'' by maximizing the window ;Macros :Macros are not //live// updated but changes are applied on save  {{$:/core/images/done-button}} ''Plugin home'': http://sideeditor.tiddlyspot.com/
//Mat <:-) von TWaddle//
$:/plugins/TWaddle/SideEditor/readme.title: $:/plugins/TWaddle/SideEditor/readme

$:/plugins/TWaddle/SideEditor/Main.text:
\define se-resizer(field)
<$range tiddler="$:/plugins/TWaddle/SideEditor/Metrics" field="$field$" class="se-slider-$field$" />
\end \define extraActions() <$action-setfield $tiddler={{$:/state/SideEditor}} text={{$:/temp/SideEditor/macrotext}} /> \end \define newTid(tid) <$list filter="""[{$:/state/SideEditor!!newtid}match[yes]]""" variable="_NUL"> <$vars tmptitle={{{ [[$tid$]get[text]splitregexp[\n]nth[1]] }}} title={{{ [[$tid$]get[text]splitregexp[\n]nth[1]!match[]else[$tid$]] }}} tags={{{ [[$tid$]get[text]splitregexp[\n]nth[2]] }}} > <$vars text={{{ [[$tid$]get[text]removeprefixtrim[]removeprefixtrim[]] ~[[$tid$]get[text]removeprefix]}}} > <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> tags=<<tags>> text=<<text>> /> <$set name=newstory filter={{{ [[$:/StoryList]get[list]] [<title>] +[replace{$:/state/SideEditor}] }}}> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/StoryList" list=<<newstory>> /> </$set> <$action-navigate $to=<<title>> $scroll=yes/> </$vars> </$vars> <$list filter="""[[$tid$]get[text]splitregexp[\n]nth[1]!match[]]"""> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-close-tiddler" $param="""$tid$"""/> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler="""$tid$"""/> </$list> <$action-deletefield $tiddler="$:/state/SideEditor" newtid /> </$list> \end \define se-main(tid, toedit, extraActions:"dummycall") <div class="se-toolbar"> <span class="se-toolbar-btns se-left"> <$list filter="""[{$:/state/SideEditor}tag[$:/tags/Macro]]"""> <$button tooltip="Close without saving macro" > <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler="$:/state/SideEditor"/> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler="$:/temp/SideEditor/macrotext"/> {{$:/core/images/left-arrow}} </$button> </$list> <$button tooltip="Save and Close editor" style="margin-left:1px;" actions="""<$action-deletetiddler $tiddler="$:/state/SideEditor"/><$action-deletetiddler $tiddler="$:/temp/SideEditor/macrotext"/>""" > <$list filter="""[[$tid$]tag[$:/tags/Macro]]"""> <$action-setfield $tiddler={{$:/state/SideEditor}} text={{$:/temp/SideEditor/macrotext}} /> </$list> <$list filter="[{$:/state/SideEditor}!is[missing]]"> <<newTid """$tid$""">> </$list> <!-- <$list filter="[{$:/state/SideEditor}is[missing]]"> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-close-tiddler" $param="""$tid$"""/> </$list> --> {{$:/core/images/done-button}} </$button> <$list filter="[[$:/state/SideEditor]newtid[yes]] ~[{$:/state/SideEditor}is[missing]]" emptyMessage="""[[$tid$]]"""> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible tc-tiddlylink se-toolbar-title"> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/state/SideEditor" newtid=yes /> <$action-navigate $to="""$tid$""" /> //[[$tid$]]// </$button> </$list> </span> <span class="se-toolbar-btns se-right"> <$button tooltip="Delete tiddler and Close editor"> {{$:/core/images/delete-button}} <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-close-tiddler" $param="""$tid$"""/> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler="""$tid$"""/> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler="""$:/temp/SideEditor/macrotext"""/> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler="""$:/state/SideEditor"""/> </$button> <$button tooltip="Save tiddler and Create new" actions="""<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/state/SideEditor" text=<<unusedtitle>> newtid=yes /><$action-deletetiddler $tiddler="$:/temp/SideEditor/macrotext" />"""> <<$extraActions$>> <$macrocall $name=newTid tid={{$:/state/SideEditor}} /> <$action-navigate $to=<<unusedtitle>> $scroll=yes/> {{$:/core/images/new-button}} </$button> <$button tooltip="Open in separate window"> <$action-deletefield $tiddler="$:/state/SideEditor" display /> <$set name=isMacro filter="""[{$:/state/SideEditor}tag[$:/tags/Macro]then[yes]else[no]]"""> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-open-window" $param="""$toedit$""" extraActions="$extraActions$" isMacro=<<isMacro>> inWindow=true template="$:/plugins/TWaddle/SideEditor/Window" height={{{[{$:/info/browser/screen/height}multiply{$:/plugins/TWaddle/SideEditor/Metrics!!top}divide[100]trunc[]subtract{$:/info/browser/screen/height}multiply[-1]subtract[100]]}}} width={{{[{$:/info/browser/screen/width}multiply{$:/plugins/TWaddle/SideEditor/Metrics!!left}divide[100]trunc[]subtract{$:/info/browser/screen/width}multiply[-1]subtract[50]]}}} /> </$set> {{$:/core/images/open-window}} </$button> </span> </div> <table class="se-editor-table"> <tr> <td style="min-width:1.5em; background:transparent;"></td> <td style="min-height:100px;"> <$edit-text tiddler="""$toedit$""" field="text" tag="textarea" class="se-editor" default=""/> </td> <$list filter="""[{$:/state/SideEditor!!newtid}match[yes]]"""> <$list filter="""[[$toedit$]is[missing]] [[$toedit$]!has[text]] +[first[]]"""> <td style="min-height:100px; background:white;"> <div class="se-editor-placeholder"> ''title row'': type title - OR - leave row __empty__ to accept "//$toedit$//"<br> ''tags row'': type tags and [‍[bracketed tags]‍] - OR - leave row __empty__<br> ''text'' ... </div> </td> <style>.se-editor-table td:nth-of-type(2) {position:absolute;} .se-editor {background:transparent;}</style> </$list> </$list> </tr> </table> \end \define sideeditor(tid) <div id="sideeditor"> <$list filter={{$:/state/SideEditor}}> <<se-resizer "left">><<se-resizer "top">> </$list> <div id="se-main"> <$list filter="""[{$:/state/SideEditor}!tag[$:/tags/Macro]]"""> <$macrocall $name=se-main tid="""$tid$""" toedit={{$:/state/SideEditor}}/> </$list> <$list filter="""[{$:/state/SideEditor}tag[$:/tags/Macro]]"""> <$macrocall $name=se-main tid="""$tid$""" toedit="$:/temp/SideEditor/macrotext" extraActions=extraActions /> </$list> <$list filter="[[$:/state/SideEditor]display[block]]"> <style>{{$:/plugins/TWaddle/SideEditor/StylesheetActive}}</style> </$list> </div> </div> \end
$:/plugins/TWaddle/SideEditor/Main.title: $:/plugins/TWaddle/SideEditor/Main
$:/plugins/TWaddle/SideEditor/Main.creator: Mat von TWaddle

$:/plugins/TWaddle/SideEditor/Stylesheet.title: $:/plugins/TWaddle/SideEditor/StylesheetActive
$:/plugins/TWaddle/SideEditor/Stylesheet.creator: Mat von TWaddle

$:/plugins/TWaddle/SideEditor/Window/Sty.text:
@media (min-width: 960px) { 
  .se-window .se-toolbar         { border:0; z-index:1}
  .se-window .se-toolbar *       { visibility:hidden; }
  .se-window .se-toolbar:hover * { visibility:visible; }
  .se-window .se-editor,
   .se-window td.se-editor-placeholder {
    position:fixed; left:0;
    min-height:100vh !important;
    width:100vw;
    padding:4em 25% !important;
    top:0; bottom:0  !important;
  }
  .se-window .se-editor, .se-window .se-editor:active, .se-window .se-editor:focus {
   border:0; outline:0; }
  .se-window .se-sliders { display:none; }
  .se-window .se-editor {width:100vw !important;
  }
  .se-window .se-editor {
  }
  .se-window > .se-toolbar { background:transparent; max-width:calc(100vw - 2em);
  }
  .se-window > .se-toolbar:hover {background:<>;
  }
  .se-window .se-toolbar:after {
    content:"";
    position:absolute; top:0em; z-index:-1;
    width:100%; height:2em;
    display:block;
    background:linear-gradient(0deg, transparent 0%, <> 100%);
 }
}

.se-window {
  position:fixed;
  top:0; left:0; right:0; bottom:0;
}

/**** TOOLBAR ****/
.se-window > .se-toolbar {
  position:fixed; top:0; left:0; right:0;
  border-width:0px; border-bottom-width:1px;
}
.se-window .se-toolbar-title { margin-left:5px;
}
.se-window .se-toolbar-btns.se-right { padding:0;
}
.se-window .se-toolbar-btns.se-left button { float:left;
}

/***** EDITOR *****/
.se-window .se-editor-table {
  margin-left:0;
  margin-top:2em; 
  border:0;
  width:100%;
  background:transparent;
}
.se-window .se-editor-table:after {display:none;
}
.se-window-table tr, .se-window-table td {
  border:0; padding:0;
}
.se-window .se-editor,
 .se-window .se-editor-placeholder {
  height:100vh !important;
  width:100vw;
  padding:5px;
  left:0;
}
.se-window .se-editor {
  outline:0; border:0;
  min-height:calc(100vh - 3em);
  background:transparent !important;
}
.se-window .se-editor-placeholder {
  position:absolute;
  z-index:-1;
  overflow:hidden;
  white-space:nowrap;
  display:none; /* default */
}
<$list filter="""[{$:/state/SideEditor}!has[title]]""">
<$list filter="""[{$:/state/SideEditor!!newtid}match[yes]] [is[missing]] +[first[]then{$:/state/SideEditor}]""">
.se-window .se-editor-placeholder { display:table-cell; }
$:/plugins/TWaddle/SideEditor/Window/Sty.title: $:/plugins/TWaddle/SideEditor/Window/Stylesheet
